title: Refactor platedhole use z.discriminatedUnion for type safety
description: Replaces z.union with z.discriminatedUnion for improved type safety in plated hole properties, ensuring shape is required for all variants.
body:
fix #204 
- Replaced z.union([...]) with z.discriminatedUnion("shape", [...]).
- Made shape required in all variants, including "circular_hole_with_rect_pad". 
- Ensured compatibility with existing TypeScript types and validation refinements

description: Fixes a bug where the application fails to process circuit layouts correctly due to missing lines in the circuit builder, and updates snapshots to reflect the changes in the layout processing logic.

title: Fix corpus example, fix layout and circuit json issues
description: fix path reconstruction from layout Rebuild paths using pin builders Use net label netId when reconstructing paths clean up types format add format instructions log circuit json to get enough information to figure out schematic trace issue introduce serialization, dig into issue with pin1 location being wrong fix corpus line drawing connect pin4 improve netlist generation from circuit json improve get matched boxes and make apply use getMatchedBoxes fix net label name determination (proper source net id mapping)
body:
- **fix path reconstruction from layout**
- **Rebuild paths using pin builders**
- **Use net label netId when reconstructing paths**
- **clean up types**
- **format**
- **add format instructions**
- **log circuit json to get enough information to figure out schematic trace issue**
- **introduce serialization, dig into issue with pin1 location being wrong**
- **fix corpus line drawing**
- **connect pin4**
- **improve netlist generation from circuit json**
- **improve get matched boxes and make apply use getMatchedBoxes**
- **fix net label name determination (proper source net id mapping)**

title: repro3 example with models
description: Adds a new test case for rendering a 3D scene with various models and components in the simple-3d-svg library.

title: round to nearest pixel (for non-images). Reduces file size
description: Adds a new formatting function to round coordinates to the nearest pixel, improving rendering precision and potentially reducing file size.

title: Round polygon points
description: Adds a helper function to round polygon points to two decimal places for improved SVG rendering accuracy.
body:
## Summary
- add `fmt` helper to round numbers to 2 decimal places
- round polygon points for faces and clip paths
- update SVG snapshots

## Testing
- `bun run format`
- `BUN_UPDATE_SNAPSHOTS=1 bun test`

title: Add scaling flags for STL/OBJ meshes

body:
## Summary
- add `scaleStlToBox` and `scaleObjToBox` flags to `Box`
- only normalize STL/OBJ meshes when these flags are true
- update tests to explicitly enable the new flags

## Testing
- `bun test`

title: Add bounding box debug rendering and improve STL/OBJ transforms
description: Adds bounding box debug rendering and improves STLOBJ transformations by applying rotations before scaling and centering models to fit inside a box.
body:
## Summary
- apply STL/OBJ rotations before scaling
- center and scale models so they fit inside a box
- optionally draw box edges via `drawBoundingBox`
- add test showing STL/OBJ rotations with bounding boxes

## Testing
- `bun test`

title: Use OBJ colors when box color not specified
description: Support optional color on Box and per-triangle color on OBJ meshes, parse material and vertex colors from OBJ files, render OBJ faces using their colors when box.color is not provided, and add regression test for OBJ colors.
body:
## Summary
- support optional `color` on `Box` and per-triangle color on OBJ meshes
- parse material and vertex colors from OBJ files
- render OBJ faces using their colors when `box.color` is not provided
- add regression test for OBJ colors

## Testing
- `bun run format`
- `bun test`
